about_the_game:
Escape a ruthless tyrant and lead your followers to a new home. Build a settlement, manage resources, and make important choices to help your people survive and thrive. Every decision matters, shaping the future of your new world. Will you lead them to greatness, or see them fall?

What is Captain's Call?

Captain's Call is a decision-making game where every choice shapes the fate of your settlement and the building of your village. The focus is on managing your followers, their morale, food supplies, resources, and treasury. As a leader, it's up to you to keep these in balance while facing various challenges.



With hundreds of unique events, your followers, neighbors, and enemies will come to you with various requests. Your priority is to make the right decisions to overcome potential dangers and ensure the safety of your followers. Additionally, the decisions you make will affect both the morale of your followers and the amount of your resources.



Human resources are crucial. Over time, people will want to join your newly established settlement. It is up to you to accept or decline them based on your resource availability and labor needs. Followers consume resources but are also essential for your buildings to function. Depending on your needs and the number of followers, there is a wide range of buildings that you can prioritize, build, and benefit from.

You can use the resources obtained from the buildings you construct in their raw form or create new products with other buildings based on your needs. It is not mandatory to produce every resource; you can focus on a specific production chain and trade the goods to purchase other needed resources.

Expand your population by offering a helping hand to strangers looking for a place to settle. You can provide temporary protection for your followers by giving resources or gold to external threats that make demands, or you can train military units to permanently eliminate these threats. Every decision you make has consequences, and your primary goal is to guide your followers toward prosperity.

name: Captain's Call

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 570 (4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Captain's Call is a strategic RPG where every decision shapes your followers' future. Manage your resources, morale, followers, and treasury wisely to protect your followers and keep your settlement thriving as you face constant challenges.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
